Text:
This is an amazing game!
Although it has been shared multiple times on TPB, it's still a wise idea to update it ;)

I wish the download speed was a little faster though. Anyway, it's just 70mb.
You can also download it directly at  tiｎy.ｃc/updateminecraft

Other than that, thanks for the share, uploader! Keep 'em coming!
